Description.value: More landclaims, zombies/animals, gametime/daylight hours, loot abundance and map sizes. Colored container states, compass-stats 'Air Temp/Wind Speed/Elevation', toolbelt numbers, clock to player menus (backpack/map, etc), the workbench combiner, a QuestArea countdown, remaining quest areas to clear, removes zombie dots from compass and enables the editor level-tools. New menu background.
